cluedo_board_game

Class BoardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • cluedo_board_game.BoardGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardGameInterface

    public class BoardGame
extends javafx.application.Application
implements BoardGameInterface
    Representation of the boardgame where player can throw a dice and move the token
